About Me

I am currently a fourth year Computer Science student at UC Davis. My interests include web developing and (ios and android) app developing. I am skilled in multiple programming languages such as C++, Javascript, Python, Java, Swift, and marked up languages such as HTML5, CSS, and Sass. I also have experience in web framework such as react, Vue, GraphQL, simpleLight box, and bootstrap. I also familiar with data-base such mongoDB, mySQL, Local Storage. To keep myself updated with latest technical advancements, I like to spend my free time reading up on new web framework and learning new programming languages.
